comment: Kop og Kande Click & Collect Fee Business Case Analysis

company_profile.product_description: Lifestyle products with Click & Collect service
company_profile.competitive_advantage: Physical store network with online integration

business_context.user_request: Analyze impact of implementing 25 DKK fee on C&C orders under 150 DKK

current_situation.problem_statement: 15.9% of all C&C orders under 130 DKK are unprofitable
current_situation.financial_impact: 336,000 DKK annual cost for small orders
current_situation.proposed_solution: 25 DKK fee on orders under 150 DKK
current_situation.cac_benchmark: Typical CAC for lifestyle stores: 150-300 DKK

business_question.primary: Er 25 DKK gebyr på små C&C ordre en rentabel strategi?
business_question.financial_focus: Hvordan påvirker gebyret bundlinjen vs. nuværende tab?
business_question.customer_focus: Hvad er risikoen for kundetab vs. CAC for livstilsbutikker?
business_question.operational_focus: Hvordan optimeres ordrestørrelse og operationel effektivitet?
business_question.expected_outcome: Data-driven business case for fee implementation

analysis_objectives: Beregn ROI for 25 DKK gebyr på ordrer under 150 DKK
Analyser kundeadfærd og churn risk vs. CAC

current_metrics.small_order_threshold: 130 DKK incl. moms (104 DKK ex. moms)
